summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 5th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 59th Street; East 51st Street and East 52nd Street, each from Latona Avenue to 5th Avenue Northeast; East 53rd Street from Latona Avenue to 6th Avenue Northeast; East 54th Street, East 55th Street, East 56th Street, East 57th Street and East 58th Street; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2846 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
